name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bernard JACKSON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bernard JACKSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John Patrick, Philadelphia, court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Steven Cooper-stein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 938
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bernard JACKSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
John Patrick, Philadelphia, court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Steven Cooper-stein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
